name: 2021 6th International Conference on Advances on Clean Energy Research（ICACER 2021）
content: Publication: After a careful reviewing process, accepted, registered and presented papers will be published in the ICACER 2021 Conference Proceedings in Energy Reports (ISSN: 2352-4847) Indexed by Science Citation Index Expanded Ei Compendex & Scopus Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ).
